title: Ticket #3722: condor_status -direct different code path for submitter ads
description:
Submitter ads that are sent to the collector are created differently from submitter ads sent in response to a condor_status -direct. That seems likely to diverge (if it hasn't already) and likely to create hard to diagnose bugs. They should likely be unified.

Ads to send to the collector are created in Scheduler::count_jobs() (/src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp around line 1303, look for "SUBMITTER_ADTYPE"). The bulk of the work is done by Scheduler::fill_submitter_ad (/src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp around line 961).

Ads in response to condor_status -direct are created in Scheduler::make_ad_list (/src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp around line 1608) (called from Scheduler::command_query_ads /src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp around line 1654). The work is entirely done inside of make_ad_list.
